name: tour-travel-email-service
description: Email service for Tour & Travel contact form

scripts.start:bg: nohup node server.js > email-service.log 2>&1 & echo $! > .email-service.pid && echo 'Email service started'
scripts.stop: kill $(cat .email-service.pid 2>/dev/null) 2>/dev/null && rm .email-service.pid && echo 'Email service stopped' || echo 'No service running'
scripts.restart: npm run stop && npm run start:bg
scripts.status: lsof -ti:3000 && echo 'Email service is running' || echo 'Email service is not running'
